name: Water Gear Solid V: The Phantom Gas
name_original: Water Gear Solid V: The Phantom Gas
description:
A game jam game for USC MEGA's Newbies v Vets Jam back in 2015. I was one of the lead designers and programmers, as well as helped integrate all assets into Gamemaker.

It's a game all about formshifting, where you must change into different forms of matter in order to traverse puzzles and enemies.
